name: Living an Endless Nightmare
description: After experiencing different trauma in your life, you are assigned a guardian angel, but in order to maintain their happiness, you must pray daily and bring offerings that you collect (candles). Your character decides that they no longer affiliate with any religion, which causes the angels to become extremely mad. They trap you in an endless cycle of hell, where you cannot distinguish what is real life and a terrible nightmare. The other characters that are seen praying, have also been trapped along with you and are experiencing the same fate.
